## Longhands.Parsed type

Extract the parsed type of a named property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type Parsed<N extends Name> = Property[N] extends Longhand<infer S, unknown> ? S : never;
```
<b>References:</b> [Name](./alfa-style.longhands.name.md)<!-- -->, [Property](./alfa-style.longhands.property.md)

## Remarks

The parsed type doesn't really exist in CSS. It is an artefact on how we handle the default keywords.
